name: Initialising...
description:
Initialising... is a wave survival game where the players are required to avoid and defend against small swarms of enemies that spawns after a particular time. The game itself will act as an 80s computer system with a little loading script that regularly inform players the next set of enemies that will appear. It is a university project that was made with MOABD (Memory of a Broken Dimension by xra) as an inspiration.

Controls: "WASD" for movement, "Mouse" to look around, "E" to shoot.

Background Music: Omni by Makeup and Vanity Set

Developers:

Celeste Chan - Twitter & Instagram
 Arielle Lee - Twitter & Instagram
